content:
Civilian Belgorod discusses dissatisfaction with the situation in the city and the indifference of Moscow to shelling.

Appropriate interception of conversationsIt was published on April 1Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

GUR reminded that for every military crime committed against Ukraine, there would be a fair payment.

Asreported the armyinform, in the previous series of intercepts, civilian Russians discussed the forced involvement of Russian citizens in voting to ensure a high level of voter appearance at polling stations.
title: “Kakiae's feast? We are here in Belgoroeja. ” - Gur interception
description: The corresponding interception of conversations was published on April 1, the Main Directorate of Intelligence ...
author: Army Inform
